day_1_content:
1. Jumping Jacks - 3 sets of 15 reps
2. Bodyweight Squats - 3 sets of 12 reps
3. Push-ups - 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Plank - 2 sets of 30 seconds
5. Bicycle Crunches - 2 sets of 15 reps per side
day_2_content:
1. High Knees - 3 sets of 1 minute
2. Mountain Climbers - 3 sets of 12 reps per side
3. Russian Twists - 3 sets of 15 reps per side
4. Plank with Shoulder Taps - 2 sets of 12 reps per side
5. Jump Rope - 3 sets of 1 minute
day_3_content:
1. Lunges - 3 sets of 12 reps per leg
2. Glute Bridges - 3 sets of 15 reps
3. Calf Raises - 3 sets of 15 reps
4. Wall Sit - 2 sets of 30 seconds
5. Leg Raises - 2 sets of 12 reps
day_4_content: Take a day off to allow your muscles to recover and repair.
day_5_content:
1. Dumbbell Rows (Alternative: Water Bottle Rows) - 3 sets of 12 reps per arm
2. Shoulder Press (Alternative: Shoulder Taps) - 3 sets of 12 reps
3. Tricep Dips - 3 sets of 10 reps
4. Bicep Curls (Alternative: Resistance Band Curls) - 3 sets of 12 reps
5. Chest Press (Alternative: Push-ups) - 3 sets of 10 reps
day_6_content:
1. Burpees - 3 sets of 10 reps
2. Jump Squats - 3 sets of 15 reps
3. Plank Jacks - 3 sets of 15 reps
4. Bicycle Crunches - 2 sets of 20 reps per side
5. High Knees - 3 sets of 1 minute
day_7_content:
1. Child's Pose - Hold for 30 seconds
2. Cat-Cow Stretch - 2 sets of 10 reps
3. Downward Dog - Hold for 30 seconds
4. Seated Forward Bend - Hold for 30 seconds
5. Cobra Stretch - Hold for 20 seconds
